title: 'Atlanta' Season 4 Premiere
description:
Charles and Van are back to break down the first two episodes of Season 4 of 'Atlanta.' The guys dive into the hidden meanings behind the journeys of Earn, Van, Alfred, and Darius in their return to Atlanta in Episode 1 (2:00). Later, the guys take a close look at Earn's trip to therapy and the events that follow in Episode 2 (24:00).
Hosts: Charles Holmes and Van Lathan
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
